Articles.Content:
Wellcome to the record Topic,

here you can post your records in this forum or ksp

its like a game

Much Fun

My Record:

Longest Forum Nickname:

Keuropean Center for Space Technologies

My record: Stagnated at 0m/s for 3:25, then sundive with topspeed of 1/5th speed of light.

My record 2: First person ever to report a cracker and get him banned from the whole KSP stuff. HarvesteR let the download link succesfully remove.

My record 3: My record 2 caused me to get the first copy of KSP, given by a dev (HarvesteR), ever for free. On my birthday.

nice record

2. Record: First KSP-SpaceStation with a CanadaArm (I know that it is a canadaarm, but it looks better )

Record 1; First person to do a manned Munar EVA.

Record 2; Created the second Rollplay Nation.

Record 1; 2nd or 3rd person to get to orbit

Record 2; Oldest active non-staff member (member 26 baby)
